title: The Newlife Youth Easter Retreat
desc:
The Newlife Youth Easter Retreat is finally here and I'm just thinking of the cool evening breeze at the beach! ☀️🌴🌊 

Join the fun!! 🏄‍♂️🏄‍♀️ 

Registration: Ksh 500 (included in the total cost) 

Mpesa: Lousa Yogo- 0707082224 

We encourage you to register early as the registration fee will facilitate early booking of the venue and other logistics ✨


See you all there!! 😃😃
